atk-s0511a7:1_0: Sumanassa pana bhagavato aparabhāge sāsane cassa antarahite navutivassasahassāyukā manussā anukkamena
atk-s0511a7:1_1: parihāyitvā dasavassāyukā hutvā puna anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā asaṅkhyeyyāyukā hutvā puna parihāyamānā saṭṭhivassasahassāyukā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0511a7:1_3: Sopi pāramiyo pūretvā anekaratanasamujjalitabhavane tusitabhavane nibbattitvā tato cavitvā sabbadhanadhaññavatisudhaññavatīnagare
atk-s0511a7:1_6: suruciramanoharaguṇagaṇavipulāya vipulāya nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṁ paṭisandhiṁ gahetvā dasannaṁ māsānaṁ
atk-s0511a7:1_7: accayena cittakūṭapabbatato suvaṇṇahaṁsarājā viya mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a7:2_0: Tassa paṭisandhiyaṁ jātiyañca pāṭihāriyāni pubbe vuttanayāneva ahesuṁ.
atk-s0511a7:2_3: Tāhi parivuto so surayuvatīhi parivuto devakumāro viya chabbassasahassāni visayasukhamanubhavamāno agāraṁ ajjhāvasi.
atk-s0511a7:2_4: So sudassanāya nāma deviyā varuṇe nāma tanaye jāte cattāri nimittāni disvā nānāvirāgatanuvaravasananivasano
atk-s0511a7:2_6: saradasamayarajanikaro viya tārāgaṇaparivuto viya cando tidasagaṇaparivuto viya dasasatanayano brahmagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0511a7:2_7: viya ca hāritamahābrahmā caturaṅginiyā mahatiyā senāya parivuto ājaññarathena mahābhinikkhamanaṁ nikkhamitvā
atk-s0511a7:2_10: Taṁ sakko devarājā suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakena paṭiggahetvā tāvatiṁsabhavanaṁ netvā sinerumuddhani sattaratanamayaṁ cetiyaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0511a7:3_0: Mahāpuriso pana devadattāni kāsāyāni paridahitvā pabbaji,
atk-s0511a7:3_2: So tehi parivuto sattamāse padhānacariyaṁ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya aññatarāya sādhudeviyā nāma seṭṭhidhītāya
atk-s0511a7:3_3: dinnaṁ madhupāyāsaṁ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṁ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye aññatarenājīvakena dinnā
atk-s0511a7:3_4: aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā mattavaranāgagāmī nāgabodhiṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tepaṇṇāsahatthavitthataṁ tiṇasantharaṁ
atk-s0511a7:3_5: santharitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṁ adhiṭṭhāya nisīditvā mārabalaṁ vidhamitvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ paṭivijjhitvā –
atk-s0511a7:7_0: Revato kira satthā bodhisamīpeyeva sattasattāhāni vītināmetvā dhammadesanatthaṁ brahmāyācanaṁ sampaṭicchitvā –
atk-s0511a7:7_1: ‘‘kassa nu kho ahaṁ paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ deseyya’’nti (dī. ni. 2.72; ma. ni. 1.284; 2.341; mahāva.
atk-s0511a7:7_2: 10) upadhārento attanā saha pabbajitabhikkhukoṭiyo aññe ca bahū devamanusse upanissayasampanne disvā
atk-s0511a7:7_3: ākāsena gantvā varuṇārāme otaritvā tehi parivuto gambhīraṁ nipuṇaṁ tiparivaṭṭaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ aññena
atk-s0511a7:7_4: anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattetvā bhikkhūnaṁ koṭi arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0511a7:11_0: Tattha khandhadhātuvavatthānanti pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ aṭṭhārasannaṁ dhātūnaṁ nāmarūpavavatthānādivasena vibhāgakaraṇaṁ.
atk-s0511a7:11_2: Atha vā pheṇapiṇḍūpamaṁ rūpaṁ parimaddanāsahanato chiddāvachiddādibhāvato ca udakapubbuḷakaṁ viya vedanā muhuttaramaṇīyabhāvato,
atk-s0511a7:11_5: māyā viya viññāṇaṁ vañcanakato’’ti evamādināpi nayena aniccānupassanādivasenapi khandhadhātuvavatthānaṁ veditabbaṁ (vibha. aṭṭha.
atk-s0511a7:11_14: abhavoti rūpārūpabhavoti evamādinā nayena bhavābhavānaṁ attho veditabbo (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 2.223; saṁ. ni. aṭṭha. 3.5.1080; udā. aṭṭha. 20).
atk-s0511a7:11_15: Tesaṁ bhavābhavānaṁ appavattihetubhūtaṁ dhammaṁ pakāsesīti attho.
atk-s0511a7:11_19: Ubhayattha nikantiyā pahānakaraṁ appavattaṁ dhammaṁ desesīti attho.
atk-s0511a7:11_20: Tassa pana revatabuddhassa tayova abhisamayā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0511a7:15_0: Tattha tīṇīti tayo, liṅgavipallāso kato, ayaṁ paṭhamo abhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a7:16_0: Athāparena samayena nagaruttare uttare nagare sabbārindamo arindamo nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0511a7:16_1: So kira bhagavantaṁ attano nagaramanuppattaṁ sutvā tīhi janakoṭīhi parivuto bhagavato paccuggamanaṁ katvā
atk-s0511a7:16_2: svātanāya nimantetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sattāhaṁ mahādānaṁ pavattetvā tigāvutavitthataṁ
atk-s0511a7:16_4: Atha bhagavā tassa manonukūlaṁ vicittanayaṁ dhammaṁ desesi.
atk-s0511a7:21_0: Athāparena samayena revato satthā uttaranigamaṁ nāma upanissāya viharanto sattāhaṁ nirodhasamāpattiṁ samāpajjitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0511a7:21_1: Tadā kira uttaranigamavāsino manussā yāgubhattakhajjakabhesajjapānakādīni āharitvā bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṁ datvā bhikkhū paripucchiṁsu – ‘‘kuhiṁ, bhante,
atk-s0511a7:21_6: Athātīte tasmiṁ sattāhe bhagavantaṁ nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhitaṁ saradasamaye sūriyo viya attano anūpamāya
atk-s0511a7:21_7: buddhasiriyā virocamānaṁ disvā nirodhasamāpattiyā guṇānisaṁsaṁ pucchiṁsu.
atk-s0511a7:21_8: Bhagavā ca tesaṁ nirodhasamāpattiyā guṇānisaṁsaṁ kathesi.
atk-s0511a7:25_0: Sudhaññavatīnagare paṭhamamahāpātimokkhuddese ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṁ arahantānaṁ gaṇanapathaṁ vītivattānaṁ paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a7:25_1: Mekhalanagare koṭisatasahassasaṅkhātānaṁ ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṁ arahantānaṁ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a7:25_2: Revatassa pana bhagavato dhammacakkānuvattako varuṇo nāma aggasāvako paññavantānaṁ aggo ābādhiko ahosi.
atk-s0511a7:25_3: Tattha gilānapucchanatthāya sampattamahājanassa lakkhaṇattayaparidīpakaṁ dhammaṁ desetvā koṭisatasahassaṁ
atk-s0511a7:25_4: purisānaṁ ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā caturaṅginike sannipāte pātimokkhaṁ uddisi.
atk-s0511a7:34_0: So tadā byādhito āsi, patto jīvitasaṁsayaṁ.
atk-s0511a7:38_1: Patto jīvitasaṁsayanti ettha jīvite saṁsayaṁ jīvitasaṁsayaṁ,
atk-s0511a7:38_3: na vā pāpuṇātīti evaṁ jīvitasaṁsayaṁ patto,
atk-s0511a7:38_5: na maratīti jīvite saṁsayaṁ pattoti attho.
atk-s0511a7:38_6: Ye tadā upagatā munīti iti dīghabhāve sati bhikkhūnaṁ upari hoti,
atk-s0511a7:38_7: rasse anussarena saddhiṁ varuṇassa upari hoti.
atk-s0511a7:39_0: Tadā amhākaṁ bodhisatto rammavatīnagare atidevo nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā brāhmaṇadhamme pāraṁ gato revataṁ
atk-s0511a7:39_1: sammāsambuddhaṁ disvā tassa dhammakathaṁ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya silokasahassena dasabalaṁ kittetvā
atk-s0511a7:39_4: ‘‘ito kappasatasahassādhikānaṁ dvinnaṁ asaṅkhyeyyānaṁ matthake gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī’’ti.
atk-s0511a7:42_0: Upagantvā revataṁ buddhaṁ, saraṇaṁ tassa gañchahaṁ.
atk-s0511a7:57_0: Āharissāmi taṁ dhammaṁ, yaṁ mayhaṁ abhipatthita’’nti.
atk-s0511a7:58_0: Tattha saraṇaṁ tassa gañchahanti taṁ saraṇaṁ agañchiṁ ahaṁ,
atk-s0511a7:58_16: Yaṁ mayhaṁ abhipatthitanti yaṁ mayā abhipatthitaṁ buddhattaṁ,
atk-s0511a7:59_0: Tassa pana revatassa bhagavato nagaraṁ sudhaññavatī nāma ahosi,
atk-s0511a7:59_3: varuṇo ca brahmadevo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a7:59_5: bhaddā ca subhaddā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a7:61_0: Divā ceva tadā rattiṁ, niccaṁ pharati yojanaṁ.
atk-s0511a7:84_0: Divā vā yadi vā rattiṁ, samantā pharati yojanaṁ.
atk-s0511a7:87_0: Tāvatā diṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṁ bahuṁ.
atk-s0511a7:92_0: ‘‘So ca kāyo ratananibho, so ca dhammo asādiso;
atk-s0511a7:94_5: So ca kāyo ratananibhoti so ca tassa bhagavato kāyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo.
